        private javax.swing.JList newList

    • Method Detail

      • init

        private void init()
        Initialize the contents of the frame.

      • updateNewListModel

        private void updateNewListModel(int idx)
        Updates the "new" commits list such that its contents are limited to only those commits starting at or after the given index of the baseListModel.
        Parameters:
        idx - The base index for restricting "new" commits.

      • updateBaseListModel

        private void updateBaseListModel()
        Updates the model for the base list UI, then subsequently the model for the "new" list UI.

      • updateNewListUI

        private void updateNewListUI()
        Populates the list of candidate "new" commits. Ensures that the list only displays commits that are more recent than the selected base commit.

      • updateBaseListUI

        private void updateBaseListUI()
        Populates the list of candidate "Base" commits, then subsequently the "new" commits.

                                      throws java.awt.HeadlessException
